document.full_text: violent storms ripped across the south overnight and friday, killing at least nine people including three children, and cutting a path of destruction through little rock and jackson, miss., authorities said on friday.
document.title: tornadoes, storms leave at least nine dead
lines_and_colors: violent storms ripped across the south overnight and friday, killing at least nine people including three children, and cutting a path of destruction through little rock and jackson, miss., authorities said on friday.
